frameDefinitions: This frame concerns rituals performed in line with religious beliefs or tradition.
The words in this frame have to do with people and the personal Relationships they are or can be a part of.
An Agent causes an Impactor to make sudden, forcible contact with an Impactee, or manipulates two (or more)
A Donor transfers a Theme from a Donor to a Recipient.
This frame concerns people being in an altered mental state that is induced by an Intoxicant.
Partner_1 interacts with Partner_2 (also collectively expressible as Partners) to change their social relationship.
frameExamples: In certain fertility <t>rites</t> in Burma , a woman desirous of offspring is required not only to approach the King Cobra but to plant a kiss on its mouth .
And of course that drippy <t><fex name='Partner_1'>boyfriend</fex></t> of hers backed her up.
He <t>slammed</t> his fist down on the table and bellowed something unintelligible.
I <t>befriended</t> the little pony by giving him a piece of apple.
listRoleDefinitions: This is the religious or cultural leader who performs and/or leads the rite.
The role <fen>Member</fen> describes the member of the religious or cultural group who participates in/undergoes the rite.
<fen>Organization</fen> identifies the institution in which the rite is prescribed.
This role identifies the <fen>Instrument</fen> used to perform a particular rite.
This role identifies the state which the rite is hoped or intended to bring about.
The type of ritual or ceremony being performed.
This role indicates an object on which a rite is performed.
Rites may confer a <fen>New_status</fen> on a participant (e.g. rank, membership).
The <fen>Guardian</fen> is the member of the <fen>Organization</fen> who instigates the rite for someone of which they are a guardian.
When the rite is performed
Where the rite takes place.
That partner in the <fen>Relationship</fen> who is realized as the subject of verbs in active form sentences, or of adjectives in predicative uses.
That partner in the <fen>Relationship</fen> who is not expressed as the external argument.
The joint construal of both <fen>Partners</fen> in the <fen>Relationship</fen>.
The <fen>Impactee</fen> is the entity which is hit by the <fen>Impactor</fen>.
The <fen>Impactor</fen> is the entity that hits the <fen>Impactee</fen> because of the <fen>Agent</fen>'s efforts.
The <fen>Impactors</fen> are the multiple entities that collide.
The <fen>Agent</fen>  causes an impact.

The <fen>Cause</fen> marks expressions that indicate some non-intentional, 
typically non-human, force that causes an <fen>Impactor</fen> to make sudden, 
forcible contact with an Impactee.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen>  when the impact occurs.
Where the event takes place.
The person that begins in possession of the <fen>Theme</fen> and causes it to be in the possession of the <fen>Recipient</fen> .
The entity that ends up in possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The object that changes ownership.
The <fen>Time</fen> is when the <fen>Donor</fen> gives the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Recipient</fen>.
The <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Donor</fen> gives the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Recipient</fen>.
The mental state of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is changed by an <fen>Intoxicant</fen> .
The <fen>Intoxicant</fen> alters the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s mental experience.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> becomes intoxicated.
The individual who comes to form a relationship with Partner_2.
The individual whose relationship with <fen>Partner_1</fen> changes.
The individuals whose relationship is changing.
The time when the relationship changes.
Where the relationship is formed.
listRoleExamples: His baptism <fex>into the Catholic Church</fex> is scheduled for next Sunday.
Elliott was almost ordained <fex>as a priest</fex>
<fex>Mr. and Mrs. Wilson</fex> baptized their son.
What I want to know is who smacked <fex>my head</fex> with a 10-ton truck?
Those hoodlums strike my car <fex>with water balloons</fex> every day!
Mr. Addams likes to collide <fex>toy trains</fex> at high speed.
<fex>One juggler</fex> was hitting the ceiling with every other ball.
A postman rammed his Fiat Panda into a getaway car <fex>after spotting the burglars </fex> .
Father Shanahan , of Rushey Mead , Leicester , rammed his Datsun into another car <fex>on the way to the city 's Gilroes cemetery</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the end of the holy month of Ramadan [4
